text:
Hi all,
I am using JUMP and CBC for MIP problem
I have log level set to 2 in cbc attributes
I was expecting the log output as  cbc is solving the problem but I only get the log output at end of execution , is it possible to get log as it is performing optimisation to get an idea of what stage the problem is in
I am currently using Jupyter notebook , not sure if this is causing this issues
Thanks

text: Or a separate log file to monitor progress
